divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving north on CO Ro 8 to St. Cloud to pick-up my daughter from daycare. I was watching the sky because I read in the paper that the Blue Angels were flying into town that day. Above the tree line in the direction of Hwy 10 I saw a hovering square object. It was dark and looked mechanical, reminded me of a transformer type object (weird comparison, but true). I watch the object hover for about 4 minutes and then it disappeared as I drove behind a small group of trees. This was 100% not an airplane, helicopter or any other flying vehicle that I have seen. Since it was in broad daylight and I am sure other people saw this too. If you did, please comment.
trends: There has been one other sighting in St Cloud
There were no other sightings in St Cloud on or around November 14th 2012
Summary: Dark object hovering over Highway 10 around 4:30 PM
